definition: Myanmar (formerly Burma) (abbr. for 緬甸|缅甸[Mian3 dian4])
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)

sentences.english: Kyat is a basic unit of currency in Burma.
sentences.chinese: 緬元是緬甸的基本貨幣單位。

sentences.english: Myanmar currency is the kyat , made up of 100 pyas.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸的貨幣爲緬元，由100緬分構成。
